plot: The painter feels mocked and taunted. Surrounded by famous portraits of painters, his frustration grows. Ultimately ending in mass chaos only to create a product of beauty.
title: The Painting
plot_es: The painter feels mocked and taunted. Surrounded by famous portraits of painters, his frustration grows. Ultimately ending in mass chaos only to create a product of beauty.
plot_en: The painter feels mocked and taunted. Surrounded by famous portraits of painters, his frustration grows. Ultimately ending in mass chaos only to create a product of beauty.
